datasets.name: data.csv
datasets.description: Related to capturing images, equipment, and techniques.

columns.name: social_media_popularity_percentile
columns.description: Indicates the percentile of the photographer's photos in terms of likes compared to others

columns.name: camera_megapixels
columns.description: The number of megapixels of the photographer's primary camera

columns.name: technique_manual_white_balance
columns.description: Indicates whether the photographer uses manual white balance setting

columns.name: frequent_tripod_use
columns.description: Indicates how often the photographer uses a tripod, rated on a scale from 1 to 10

columns.name: post_processing_skill
columns.description: Rating of the photographer's skill in post-processing images on a scale from 1 to 10

columns.name: investment_in_equipment
columns.description: The total amount of money the photographer spent on photography equipment in the last year.

columns.name: annual_travel_count
columns.description: Number of times a photographer travels per year specifically for photography

columns.name: camera_resolution_megapixels
columns.description: The maximum image resolution of the photographer's primary camera, measured in megapixels

columns.name: active_in_online_forums
columns.description: Whether the photographer is active in online photography forums

columns.name: hours_spent_photography_weekly
columns.description: Number of hours spent on photography per week

columns.name: posts_on_social_media
columns.description: Indicates whether the photographer posts their work on social media

columns.name: equipment_budget
columns.description: Annual budget of the photographer for purchasing photography equipment in thousands of dollars

columns.name: photography_experience_years
columns.description: The number of years of experience the photographer has

columns.name: technique_HDR
columns.description: Indicates whether the photographer uses High Dynamic Range techniques

columns.name: average_lens_cost
columns.description: The average cost of camera lenses the photographer owns

columns.name: indoor_shoots_count
columns.description: The number of indoor photography sessions the photographer has completed

columns.name: evening_shoots_count
columns.description: Number of photo shoots conducted in the evening hours

columns.name: outdoor_shoots_count
columns.description: The number of outdoor photography sessions the photographer has completed

columns.name: uses_smartphone_secondary
columns.description: Indicates whether the photographer uses a smartphone as a secondary device

columns.name: camera_weight_grams
columns.description: The weight of the primary camera used by the photographer in grams

columns.name: wildlife_photography_frequency
columns.description: Frequency of engaging in wildlife photography

columns.name: workshops_attended
columns.description: Number of photography related workshops the photographer attends annually

columns.name: frequency_long_exposure
columns.description: The number of times the photographer uses long exposure techniques in a month.

columns.name: sponsored_shoots
columns.description: Binary indicator if the photographer has participated in shoots sponsored by major brands

columns.name: photo_editing_software_use
columns.description: Indicates whether the photographer uses photo editing software

columns.name: participation_in_outdoor_workshops
columns.description: Indicates the number of outdoor photography workshops the photographer has attended in the last year

columns.name: client_rating
columns.description: Average client rating for the photographer on a scale of 1.0 to 5.0

columns.name: frequent_photo_editing
columns.description: Indicates whether the photographer frequently edits photos (more than 3 times a week).

columns.name: specialized_lenses_count
columns.description: Number of specialized lenses a photographer owns

columns.name: awards_won
columns.description: The number of photography awards the photographer has won

columns.name: competitions_participated
columns.description: Number of photography competitions a photographer participates in per year

columns.name: prefers_manual_settings
columns.description: Indicates whether the photographer prefers to use manual settings over automatic.

columns.name: weekly_editing_hours
columns.description: Average number of hours a photographer spends on editing photos per week

columns.name: is_professional
columns.description: Indicates if the photographer is a professional

columns.name: photography_focus
columns.description: Primary focus of the photographer, categorized by subject matter

columns.name: photography_contests_won
columns.description: The number of photography contests the photographer has won

columns.name: specializes_in_wildlife
columns.description: Indicates if the photographer specializes in wildlife photography

columns.name: percentage_nature_photos
columns.description: The percentage of photos in the photographer's portfolio that are nature-themed

columns.name: participates_online_contests
columns.description: Indicates whether the photographer participates in online contests

columns.name: primary_shooting_condition
columns.description: Primary lighting condition the photographer usually shoots in

columns.name: prefers_landscape_photography
columns.description: Indicates whether the photographer prefers landscape photography

columns.name: follows_industry_news
columns.description: Whether the photographer regularly follows photography related industry news

columns.name: number_of_outdoor_shoots
columns.description: The total number of outdoor photography sessions conducted by the photographer per month

columns.name: percentage_of_studio_work
columns.description: The percentage of total photography work that is done in a studio setting

queries.question: Is there a relationship between preferring landscape photography, frequent tripod use, and technique preference for white balance in photography?
queries.true_hypothesis: Photographers who prefer landscape photography and use tripods frequently are more likely to use manual white balance for their photography.
